item.title: tiddlywiki_entry_everyday_for_30_days
item.description: ====== Tiddlywiki entry everyday for 30 days ====== I’m going to make it a goal to make a tiddlywiki entry every day for 30 days. This will be in effort to help form a habit. Here is my plan, add items to track quick ideas like Million dollar ideas, things to research, plans for the house, programming/learning notes. Really Tiddlywiki should be quick and dirty, I want this dokuwiki to be more mature, organized, especially since it’s versioned with git.
